New 2003 model cars headed for showrooms show steady decline in fuel economy

“Average fuel economy for the galaxy of shiny new 2003 model cars and trucks headed for showrooms is 20.8 miles per gallon, about 6 percent below the high point for passenger vehicle fuel economy set 15 years ago.” Freep.com
